products.name: Voltron Mini Action Voltron Vehicle Force Figure (Standard)
products.description: From the Voltron franchise comes a new Mini Action Voltron Vehicle Force figure by Action Toys. This figure is highly articulated and able to produce various poses from the series, along with being able to separate various parts to form vehicles. This Voltron Vehicle Force toy figure is sure to be a great addition to any Voltron collection!

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Uchiha Sasuke Figure
products.description: This Sasuke Uchiha figure from Naruto Shippuden stands 16 cm tall and is made of PVC. The figure is highly detailed, capturing Sasuke's intense gaze and his signature outfit from the series.

products.name: Dragon Ball Z Goku Super Saiyan Figure
products.description: This Super Saiyan Goku figure is a must-have for any Dragon Ball Z fan. Standing at 20 cm, it features Goku in his iconic Super Saiyan form, ready for battle.
features: De la serie Dragon Ball Z

products.name: One Piece Monkey D. Luffy Figure
products.description: This Monkey D. Luffy figure from One Piece is part of the Portrait.Of.Pirates (P.O.P) series. Standing at 21 cm, it captures Luffy's adventurous spirit and iconic pose.

products.name: Attack on Titan Eren Yeager Figure
products.description: Eren Yeager from Attack on Titan is brought to life with this detailed figure. At 18 cm, Eren is depicted in his Survey Corps uniform, ready to take on any Titan.
features: De la serie Attack on Titan
Incluye accesorios de la Survey Corps

products.name: My Hero Academia Izuku Midoriya Figure
products.description: This figure of Izuku Midoriya, also known as Deku, from My Hero Academia stands at 19 cm. It features Deku in his hero costume, ready to take on any challenge.
features: De la serie My Hero Academia

products.name: Sword Art Online Kirito Figure
products.description: Kirito from Sword Art Online is depicted in this stunning figure. Standing at 22 cm, Kirito is shown in his signature black outfit, wielding his swords.
features: De la serie Sword Art Online

products.name: Fairy Tail Natsu Dragneel Figure
products.description: This Natsu Dragneel figure from Fairy Tail is highly detailed and captures Natsu's fiery personality. Standing at 18 cm, it includes his iconic scarf and fire effects.

products.name: Bleach Ichigo Kurosaki Figure
products.description: This Ichigo Kurosaki figure from Bleach stands at 20 cm and features Ichigo in his Soul Reaper uniform, ready to battle with his Zanpakuto.

products.name: Death Note Light Yagami Figure
products.description: Light Yagami from Death Note is captured in this detailed figure. Standing at 17 cm, Light is depicted holding the Death Note, with a confident expression.

products.name: Fullmetal Alchemist Edward Elric Figure
products.description: Edward Elric from Fullmetal Alchemist is featured in this highly detailed figure. Standing at 18 cm, Edward is shown with his automail arm and determined expression.

products.name: Neon Genesis Evangelion Asuka Langley Figure
products.description: This Asuka Langley figure from Neon Genesis Evangelion stands at 19 cm and features Asuka in her iconic red plugsuit, ready for action.
features: De la serie Neon Genesis Evangelion
